message: Arriving home from work, I pull out my key with some apprehension.
I hope Granny has behaved herself.
But just as I put the key in the door―

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh?"
...Don't tell me.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...It's open."
The door isn't locked.
Did I forget to lock it again?

name: 蒼葉
message: "Shit. Granny's home! What if something happened?!"
We live in a pretty tight-knight community, but the town being what it is, burglaries are not at all uncommon.
I listen carefully as I enter the house, feeling sick to my stomach. How could I be so careless?
...No sign of an intruder.
I take off my shoes and head straight for Granny's room.
I quietly open the door and peer inside. Granny is there, asleep under her comforter.
Looks like she's fine.
I heave a sigh of relief and close the door.
I pause on the stairs. Something feels off.
Granny is sleeping, so the house is quiet. Nothing is out of place.
Maybe it was just my imagination.
While pondering this, I climb the stairs and open the door to my room.
At which point, I immediately realize that it wasn't my imagination at all.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What the―"
I'm not exactly proud of it, but my room has never been what you'd call clean.
I had books and magazines piled up on the floor, plus all sorts of other stuff I left out because that was less annoying than cleaning it up.
But I don't remember it being quite this bad.
My room is a complete disaster. It looks like a tornado ripped through it.
There isn't even anywhere to stand. All the shelves have been pulled out and the table is upside-down.
But that isn't even the most unsettling thing amid the mess.
A man is sitting in front of my computer, his back to me, like it's his room, not mine.
This is exactly what I was afraid of!

name: 蒼葉
message: "Thief!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Where do you get off breaking into someone's room?!"
He looks up slowly, like he only just noticed I was there.
I've never seen the man before. He looks about my age.

name: ノイズ
message: "You're back."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Who the hell are you, and what are you doing in my room?!"

name: ノイズ
message: "Look, man."
He just ignores me as I stand there, trembling with rage, and taps the keyboard with his middle finger.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey! Don't touch my stuff!"

name: ノイズ
message: "The data on this thing makes no fuckin' sense. How'd you even manage this?"

name: ノイズ
message: "And these Allmate mods are something else. Where'd you learn to do this?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "What's it to you?! Just get out!"
He rises to his feet with a snort.

name: ノイズ
message: "You saying you don't know who I am?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh?"

name: ノイズ
message: "I think you do know."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I have no idea. You've got me confused with someone else."
He stares right at me, then slowly opens his mouth.

name: ノイズ
message: "Thank you for coming on this felicitous occasion."

name: ノイズ
message: "Shall we get the party started?"
Where have I heard that before?
I have a really bad feeling about this...

name: ノイズ
message: "Still don't remember?"
He pulls something out of his pants pocket.
It's a key chain... with a tiny rabbit head on the end.
It's him!
I guess he's satisfied with my reaction, because he tosses the keychain aside and looks at me again.

name: ノイズ
message: "Pretty good performance, right? Misdirected delivery and all."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You're the one who ganked me?! And that delivery..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "That was you too?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Yeah. I found out where you worked, so I figured I'd bring you to me."

name: ノイズ
message: "I paid in advance, so it's no problem for the shop, right?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "That's not the problem here!"
Anger wells up inside me as I remember how upset Mr. Haga was.

name: ノイズ
message: "By the way. You did it before, too... but what was that skill you used in our battle?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "What are you talking about?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Don't play dumb. I wanna know how you beat me."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Beat you?"
Did I win that fight? I can't remember...

name: ノイズ
message: "Are you deaf? Say something."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...I don't remember."

name: ノイズ
message: "What?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I don't remember anything about how that fight ended."
He scowls a bit before returning to his deadpan expression.

name: ノイズ
message: "Don't wanna talk, huh?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Guh!"
He suddenly grabs me by the collar and slams me into the wall.
This guy's stronger than he looks!

name: ノイズ
message: "Then I guess I'll just have to beat it out of you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Ngh, let me go!"

name: ノイズ
message: "You really don't remember?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "No!"
He stares into my eyes like he's searching for something.

name: ノイズ
message: "I want a rematch."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What? I don't even play Rhyme... Ngh."
He shoves me into the wall even harder.

name: ノイズ
message: "Still think you can lie your way outta this?"

name: ノイズ
message: "I guess I'll just have to take something from you."

name: ノイズ
message: "I know what's important to you. I know everything."
He shoots a meaningful glance at the computer.
I know what he means by that. Ren.
He's not bluffing. I can feel the threat hanging in the air. He'll really destroy Ren's data if I don't give him what he wants.
But the fact is, I don't want to fight in Rhyme.
And the guy is starting to piss me off.
